<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataCO extends data { const CODE = 'CO'; const PREFIX = 57; const REGION = 'South America'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:1\d|3)\d{9}|[124-8]\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '[124-8][2-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '3333(?:0(?:0\d|1[0-5])|[4-9]\d\d)\d{3}|33(?:00|3[0-24-9])\d{6}|3(?:0[0-5]|1\d|2[0-3]|5[01]|70)\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '1800\d{7}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '19(?:0[01]|4[78])\d{7}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d)(\d{7})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{3})(\d{7})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d)(\d{3})(\d{7})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
